top_comments.comment: It's always a pleasure dying in your videos
wow, this is a cool surprise, sounds great really enjoyed it, greetings from  new zealand

I'm going to date myself. I remember when this was released aby the Bee Gees. And it was good. I must say, I enjoyed your version much better 😊 and thank you for the warning at the beginning of your video. I'm sure the video is amazing, since you all sang so wonderfully!! However, blinking lights can bring on a vertigo attack (lol I don't even get those right. Instead of the room "constantly spinning" mine rocks. Like I'm on a rocking horse and I can't get off. And it can last anywhere from a few minutes to a month.) Anyways, can't wait to hear more of your music! So glad I'm a subscriber 🥰

comments_since_last_sample.body: Nice collab! and you are nice musiciants with great taste of music. Thanks
wow, this is a cool surprise, sounds great really enjoyed it, greetings from  new zealand
